TowerDefenseMonster.8070201.1: [Elite] Increases Weight when planting its hands into the ground. Fierce attacks can interrupt this state.
TowerDefenseMonster.8079902.1: Keeps speeding up while rolling. Resets after being inflicted with a control effect.
TowerDefenseMonster.8079903.1: [Elite] Increases Weight when planting its hands into the ground. Fierce attacks can interrupt this state.
TowerDefenseMonster.8089901.1: Grants a speed boost to all nearby allies. Must be eliminated first.
TowerDefenseMonster.8089902.1: [Boss] Spreads mud that slows all squadmates and grants DMG Boost or DMG RES based on Weight.
